item.title: By: Wild Bill
item.dc:creator: Wild Bill
item.description: <p>Yes - a scheduled agent can open a "remote" database if the current server is in the "trusted servers" field on the remote server document. </p><p>Handy. And beats using the C-API call NSFDbOpen (which bypassed this restriction)...</p><p>---* Bill</p>
item.content:encoded:
Yes – a scheduled agent can open a “remote” database if the current server is in the “trusted servers” field on the remote server document.

Handy. And beats using the C-API call NSFDbOpen (which bypassed this restriction)…

—* Bill
